title: How to prepare for AS Level Biology, Physics, and Chemistry P1 in a week? I am aiming for an A in all. How do I study - Quora

response.answer_text: Memorize and understand all the concepts and clarify any doubts.Look through all your P1 you did before.Take note of your mistakes on a paper and clarify any doubts.Practice doing your P1 under timed conditionsMark your work and clarify your doubts.Aim to do your paper at a shorter time (with lesser careless mistakes) than the paper you did previously → mark → clarify doubtsThe most important thing is to clear your doubts so that you can understand, and memorize the concepts faster. Since you are left with only 1 week, you should wake up as early as possible to study. I hope my tips helped you! All the best for your examinations! You can do it!! :)

Wake up at 8 in the morning. Do one past paper of each subject. Mark and correct each past paper and spend and identify topics you need work on. Spend the rest of the day revising these topics. It's possible to get an A with just one week of revision if you're smart and really efficient with your time.
Do as many papers as you can. Go through each and every concept of the book and make sure you know and understand everything.
